title: Video game posters at USC's GamePipe
content:
I thought these posters for the student’s video games were interesting. Apparently they have to design a poster to ’sell’ their game at the lab’s Demo Day.

[http://content.zdnet.com/2346-9595\_22-65569-1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905093340/http:/content.zdnet.com/2346-9595_22-65569-1.html "http://content.zdnet.com/2346-9595\_22-65569-1.html")

 [‹ "Hypothetical" on Eula / embedding](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905093340/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33714 "Go to previous forum topic") [Going Down Under ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905093340/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33700 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Gus Winterbottom

comments.content:
Not a sniff of Trajan, what is wrong with students?  
I know somebody who would go for the drumming game.

Tim
